entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
